We are happy to announce **Docusaurus 2.1**, our very first minor version release.

translations.zh-hant: 我們很高興宣布推出 **Docusaurus 2.1**，這是我們的首個次要版本更新。

segments.source_content: The upgrade should be easy: as explained in our [release process documentation](/community/release-process), minor versions respect [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/).

translations.zh-hant: 升級過程應該很簡單：正如我們的[發佈流程文件](/community/release-process)所述，次要版本遵循[語意化版本控制](https://semver.org/)規範。

segments.source_content: ![Docusaurus 2.1 social card](./img/social-card.png)
<!--truncate-->
## Highlights
### DocCardList improvements
In [#8008](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8008), we simplified the usage of the`<DocCardList>` component, that is notably used on sidebar category generated index pages.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#8008](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8008) 中，我們簡化了 `<DocCardList>` 元件的使用方式，該元件主要用於側邊欄分類自動生成的索引頁面。

segments.source_content: The `items` prop is now optional, and will be automatically inferred from the content of the parent sidebar category:

translations.zh-hant: 現在 `items` 屬性變為可選，系統會自動從父級側邊欄分類的內容推斷：

segments.source_content: Also, we made it possible to use it on any document, including regular docs not linked to any sidebar category.

translations.zh-hant: 此外，我們讓該元件能應用於任何文件，包括未連結到任何側邊欄分類的常規文件。

segments.source_content: ![simplified DocCardList component](./img/doc-card-list.png)
### `noindex` improvements

We improved the support of the [`noindex` meta `robots` directive](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/block-indexing), a way to signal search engines you don't want a specific page to be indexed.

translations.zh-hant: 我們增強了 [`noindex` 元標籤 `robots` 指令](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/block-indexing)的支援，該指令用於向搜尋引擎表明不希望特定頁面被索引。

segments.source_content: In [#7963](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7963), we allow `noindex` to be configured on a per-docs-version basis.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#7963](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7963) 中，我們允許按文件版本配置 `noindex`。

segments.source_content: Use the following plugin options to tell crawlers you don't want the `1.0.0` version to be indexed:

translations.zh-hant: 使用以下插件選項可告知爬蟲您不希望索引 `1.0.0` 版本：

segments.source_content: In practice, Docusaurus will add the following meta to each page of that version:

translations.zh-hant: 實際運作時，Docusaurus 會為該版本的每個頁面添加以下元標籤：

segments.source_content:
```html
<meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" />
```

In [#7964](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7964), we also fixed a bug where the sitemap plugin would still contain pages that have a `noindex` directive. Now the sitemap plugin will reliably filter out all the pages containing `noindex` directives.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#7964](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7964) 中，我們也修復了網站地圖插件仍會包含帶有 `noindex` 指令頁面的錯誤。現在網站地圖插件能可靠地過濾掉所有含 `noindex` 指令的頁面。

segments.source_content: ### Overriding default meta tags
In [#7952](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7952), it becomes possible to override default html meta tags you couldn't before:

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#7952](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7952) 中，現在可以覆蓋之前無法修改的預設 HTML 元標籤：

segments.source_content:
```jsx
<>
  {siteConfig.noIndex && <meta name="robots" content="nofollow, noindex" />}
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
</>
```
It is now possible to use `<Head>` or `themeConfig.metadata`:

- to override the `viewport` meta
- to override the `robots` meta: you could mark your site as `noIndex`, but except for specific pages that should be indexed

translations.zh-hant:
- 覆蓋 `viewport` 元標籤
- 覆蓋 `robots` 元標籤：您可將整個網站標記為 `noIndex`，但允許特定頁面被索引

segments.source_content: ### Ukrainian translations
In [#7953](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7953), we added default classic theme translations for the Ukrainian language.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#7953](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7953) 中，我們為烏克蘭語添加了經典主題的預設翻譯。

segments.source_content: ## Other changes
Check the [2.1.0 changelog entry](/changelog/2.1.0) for an exhaustive list of changes.

translations.zh-hant: 查看 [2.1.0 更新日誌](/changelog/2.1.0) 獲取完整的變更清單。
